name: AskMyDad
0:
”Alexa, ask my dad for advice”
”Alexa, ask my dad if i can borrow some money”
”Alexa, ask my dad can i have a snack”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my dad
des: Ask My Dad is a fun way to hear some classical dad-isms. Most responses are humorous, but you may be surprised that Dad actually has a little bit of wisdom hidden under those grey hairs.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
